Uses of Interface
org.apache.hama.ipc.VersionedProtocol

  • Packages that use VersionedProtocol 
    Package Description
    org.apache.hama.bsp
    BSP computing framework.
    org.apache.hama.bsp.message
    Contains the implementation of message transfer.
    org.apache.hama.ipc
    Tools to help define network clients and servers.

    • Uses of VersionedProtocol in org.apache.hama.bsp

      Classes in org.apache.hama.bsp that implement VersionedProtocol 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BSPMaster
      BSPMaster is responsible to control all the groom servers and to manage bsp jobs.
      class  GroomServer
      A Groom Server (shortly referred to as groom) is a process that performs bsp tasks assigned by BSPMaster.
      class  LocalBSPRunner
      A multithreaded local BSP runner that can be used for debugging and local running BSP's.
      static class  LocalBSPRunner.LocalUmbilical 

    • Uses of VersionedProtocol in org.apache.hama.bsp.message

      Subinterfaces of VersionedProtocol in org.apache.hama.bsp.message 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  HamaMessageManager<M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
      Hama RPC Interface for messaging.
      Classes in org.apache.hama.bsp.message that implement VersionedProtocol 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HamaAsyncMessageManagerImpl<M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
      Implementation of the HamaMessageManager
      class  HamaMessageManagerImpl<M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
      Implementation of the HamaMessageManager.

    • Uses of VersionedProtocol in org.apache.hama.ipc

      Subinterfaces of VersionedProtocol in org.apache.hama.ipc 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  BSPPeerProtocol
      Protocol that task child process uses to contact its parent process.
      interface  GroomProtocol
      A protocol for BSPMaster talks to GroomServer.
      interface  HamaRPCProtocolVersion
      There is one version id for all the RPC interfaces.
      interface  JobSubmissionProtocol
      Protocol that a groom server and the central BSP Master use to communicate.
      interface  MasterProtocol
      A new protocol for GroomServers communicate with BSPMaster.
